p: As shown in Fig. 6, only the growth of K. pneumoniae decreased to <50% after treatment with ZOEO. E. coli, with a growth of 74%, was more resistant than others. In previously published papers, MIC of ZOEO on targeted bacteria, including P. aeruginosa 31.25, S. aureus 7.81, E. coli 62.5 ( 25), and K. pneumoniae 20 ( 26) were reported.
